Attributes.description: The attributes that are associated with the Facet.

Name.description: The name of the Facet, which is unique for a given schema.

ObjectType.description: Specifies whether a given object created from this facet is of type node, leaf node, policy or index.   Node: Can have multiple children but one parent.     Leaf node: Cannot have children but can have multiple parents.     Policy: Allows you to store a policy document and policy type. For more information, see Policies.     Index: Can be created with the Index API.

SchemaArn.description: The schema ARN in which the new Facet will be created. For more information, see arns.
